message.entry: SampleRate must be at least twice the frequency deviation.
A System object used to create an FMModulator must be an FMDemodulator.
A System object used to create an FMDemodulator must be an FMModulator.
A System object used to create an FMBroadcastModulator must be an FMBroadcastDemodulator.
A System object used to create an FMBroadcastDemodulator must be an FMBroadcastModulator.
The signal length (number of rows) must be a multiple of the decimation factor: {0,number,integer}. The decimation factor can also be obtained using the info method.
The input signal must be a two-column matrix (each column representing a channel) when the Stereo property is set to true.
The input signal must be a column vector when the Stereo property is set to false.
